name: Rosenbauer Panther 6x6
description:
This was a University Research project looking at how one would approach making an interactive fire engine and the considerations that come with it. This project looked into developing my own models into something that is playable which is something that I haven't done too much of before, as I come from mainly a 3D art background.

This game was designed as a simulation-style experience for interacting with an airport fire engine. This is more of a proof of concept which will be taken and built upon.
